data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wurdack, Kenneth J. (2017): A new disjunct Dendrothrix (Euphorbiaceae, tribe Hippomaneae): a Guiana Shield element in sub-Andean cordilleras of Ecuador and Peru. PhytoKeys 86: 117-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.86.14761, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.86.14761
